name: TheLongDrop
description:
Team Name

TheLongDrop

Input:

W A S D for Movement

Mouse for Turning

You need to Falling as long as possible and You can go back to the top of the map through a Portal.(You will need a luck to get higher scores)

This game use assets from

https://www.cgtrader.com/free-3d-models/space/spaceship/star-sparrow-modular-spa...
